SupportMeResources.Title: Support YTGBO
SupportMeResources.Message:
Oh, hello there! :) Enjoying the widget? Me too, after all I (the developer) am also an user and it helps me a lot watching videos, playlists and lives while gaming.
This is my goal with YTGBO, to guarantee an amazing experience for all users, every received feedback counts! This comes with a lot of hard work and some service costs to keep the widget working smoothly and free for everyone (even without ads).
So if you want to show some love and support to the widget please consider making a donation with the button below, any amount is welcome.❤
